00069             function                __construct()
00070             {
00071                   try
00072                   {
00073                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00074                         $this->Link = get_package( 'link' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00075                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00076                         $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00077                   }
00078                   catch( Exception $e )
00079                   {
00080                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00081                   }

00114             function                get_last_field_vlue( $id , $ObjectType , $FieldName )
00115             {
00116                   try
00117                   {
00118                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00119                         $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'integer' );;
00120                         $FieldName = $this->Security->get( $FieldName , 'command' );
00121                         
00122                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00123                         
00124                         $Entry = $this->Database->select( 
00125                               $this->NativeTable.'.field_value' , 
00126                               $this->NativeTable , 
00127                               $this->NativeTable.".object_id = $id AND ".$this->NativeTable.".object_type = $ObjectType AND ".
00128                                     $this->NativeTable.".field_name LIKE '".$FieldName."' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1"
00129                         );
00130 
00131                         if( isset( $Entry[ 0 ] ) )
00132                         {
00133                               return( get_field( $Entry[ 0 ] , 'field_value' ) );
00134                         }
00135                         
00136                         return( false );
00137                   }
00138                   catch( Exception $e )
00139                   {
00140                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00141                   }
00142             }

00178             function                need_save_field( $id , $ObjectType , $FieldName , $NewFieldValue )
00179             {
00180                   try
00181                   {
00182                         $Value = $this->get_last_field_vlue( $id , $ObjectType , $FieldName );
00183 
00184                         return( $Value === false || ( $Value == $NewFieldValue ? false : true ) );
00185                   }
00186                   catch( Exception $e )
00187                   {
00188                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00189                   }
00190             }

00218             function                add_to_history( $id , $ObjectType , $Record )
00219             {
00220                   try
00221                   {
00222                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00223                         
00224                         $Record = $this->Security->get( $Record , 'string' );
00225                         
00226                         $ObjectType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'history' , $ObjectType );
00227                         $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
00228                         $Author = get_field( $User , 'id' );
00229                         
00230                         foreach( $Record as $FieldName => $FieldValue )
00231                         {
00232                               if( $this->need_save_field( $id , $ObjectType , $FieldName , $FieldValue ) )
00233                               {
00234                                     $this->Database->insert( $this->NativeTable , 
00235                                           'object_id , object_type , field_name , field_value , creation_date , author' , 
00236                                           "$id , $ObjectType , '$FieldName' , '$FieldValue' , NOW() , $Author"
00237                                     );
00238                                     
00239                                     $this->Database->commit();
00240                               }
00241                         }
00242                   }
00243                   catch( Exception $e )
00244                   {
00245                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00246                   }
00247             }

00275             function                get_history( $id , $ObjectType )
00276             {
00277                   try
00278                   {
00279                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00280                         $ObjectType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'history' , $ObjectType );
00281                         
00282                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00283                         
00284                         return( 
00285                               $this->Database->select( 
00286                                     $this->NativeTable.'.* , umx_user.login AS author_name' , 
00287                                     $this->NativeTable.' , umx_user' , 
00288                                     $this->NativeTable.".author = umx_user.id AND ".$this->NativeTable.".object_id = $id AND ".
00289                                           $this->NativeTable.".object_type = $ObjectType ORDER BY id ASC"
00290                               )
00291                         );
00292                   }
00293                   catch( Exception $e )
00294                   {
00295                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00296                   }
